page.title: 03POPULARITY OF WESTOWN
page.content: PEOPLE LIKE LIVING IN WESTOWN BECAUSE IT'S QUIET AND AN ATTRACTIVE PLACE TO LIVE.IT'S KEPT ITS COUNTRY ATMOSPHERE AND NOTHING MUCH HAS CHANGED.SOME PEOPLE ALSO SAY THAT LIVING IN WESTOWN IS A GOOD PLACE TO LIVE BECAUSE IT IS NEAR TO THE SEA,NEAR TO THE SHOPS AND NORMALLY SUNNY.SOME PEOPLE LIKE THE HOLIDAY MAKERS AND SOME DON'T.ONE PERSON SAID THAT IT WOULD BE A GHOSTTOWN WITHOUT VISITORS.IT HAS LOTS OF NICE WALKS AND A PEACEFUL HARBOUR.IT ALSO HAS A LOT OF WILD LIFE.MOST OF THE SHOP KEEPERS ARE KIND AND FRIENDLY TO EVERYONE.IT HAS A FREE AND EASY ATMOSPHERE.THE BEACH IS A GOOD SUCCESS IN WATER SPORTS.IT HAS EASY ACCESS TO THE SEA.IN ALL WESTOWN IS A SUCCESFUL PLACE.
